text:
util_ldap.c has
AP_INIT_TAKE23("LDAPTrustedGlobalCert", util_ldap_set_trusted_global_cert,
                   NULL, RSRC_CONF,

RSRC_CONF means that it can't be placed inside a directory/location.

Some of the examples in mod_ldap.xml use it inside a directory/location, and the doc also has the text "Most other toolkits require clients certificates to be set per Directory or per Location using LDAPTrustedClientCert."
creator: trawick@apache.org
